title: I feel wetness in pants during sujood as sahu, is my prayer valid? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: so from the usum like during like the I like feel like wetness on my pan is my prayer value is after the Salam what what is this wet what is this wetness uh I I think urine or M how did this urine or M reach your hand oh no no on on pants pants okay are you certain that you have ejaculated or emitted such m or urine yeah and is this feeling uh or this certainity was present during the Salat or you felt it after the Salat after theam dur the the prayer is valid as long as you offered to Salam then your prayer is valid
